The Shire Chamber of Commerce

The Shire Chamber of Commerce Target Audience Color Scheme Typography

Color Scheme

The color scheme is a critcal part of the web design because it dictate the feel of The Shire Chamber of Commerce. Beacuse green relates a feeling of earth, nature, food and fresh, The Shire Chamber of Commerce has decided to weave green into the colour scheme of the entire site.

Style Guide

Through out the site, and in other marketing material the site will use the following websafe colors.

#6EBA4A

#375B25

#579439

#272830

Logo Style Guide

For digital and print medai use main logo with colour with width 200px on most screens.



For black and white print medai use this logo.
